name: Ometrius PEREZ v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION

parties:
Ometrius PEREZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
attorneys: The petitioner Ometrius Perez' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 906, 154 A.3d 90 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Ometrius PEREZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided April 5, 2017
Ometrius Perez, self-represented, in support of the petition.
Marjorie A. Dauster, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.
The petitioner Ometrius Perez' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 906, 154 A.3d 90 (2017), is denied.
McDONALD, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
